scripts.browser: browserify -e src/api.js --debug -o build/skematic.dev.js -s Skematic -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ add-module-exports transform-object-rest-spread ] ]
scripts.watch:browser: watchify -e src/api.js --debug -o build/skematic.dev.js -s Skematic -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ add-module-exports transform-object-rest-spread ] ]
scripts.build: npm run browser && npm run compress
scripts.docs: documentation build index.js --name Skematic -o docs -f html
scripts.dev: npm run test:chain -s & nodemon --quiet --watch src --exec npm run build -s
scripts.lint: standard --verbose index.js src/**/*.js test/*.js perf/*.js | snazzy
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run coverage && rm -rf build && mkdir build && npm run build && npm run benchmark
